huǐmiè perish; ruin; destroy

xiāohuǐ to destroy (by melting or burning)

zhuīzhú to chase; to pursue vigorously

traditional: 逐個
zhúgè one by one; one after another
zhúchū expel

traditional: 逐漸

traditional: 填補
tiánbǔ to fill a gap; to fill in a blank (on a form); to overcome a deficiency
